# OngavaDecomp
## code

This folder includes code for analyses related to the Ongava Decomposition Experiment.

"MassLoss.qmd" includes code to analyze mass loss data from the decomposition experiment.

"Ongava_Kestrel_compilation.qmd" includes code to compile kestrel data from Ongava. Loggers recorded hourly data, with each logger outputting a separate file (one per monthly download). This code compiles all the data into a single file and complete some initial analysis.

"OngavaPPR_WorldClim.qmd" includes code to extract WorldClim data for the Ongava sites. Historical rainfall data are explored and these data are used to come up with a planned watering regime for the decomposition experiment.
